title: Give Away & Tournament
body:
I'm currently doing a 1350 RP Skin of choice Give away and will do every week day on Friday and I'm also planning a 1v1 Tournament upcoming in the following week or two which i will go into further detail on soon and also make an official post for it on boards and in discord https://discord.gg/pgZyqb9 **join for more information if interested.**

**1st Prize:** $20 RP
**2nd Prize:** $10 RP
**3rd Prize:** $5 and some exp boosts

Prizes may change depending on number of participants
